_meta.purpose: Magic system rules and all four magic schools (General, Animism, Elementalism, Mentalism) with complete spell data from the Dragonbane core rulebook
_meta.language_note: Swedish original terms preserved in 'name_sv' fields; English translations verified against the official Dragonbane Dictionary v1.1.

mechanical_effects.value: Move one loose object (max weight 1) within 10m to your hand

mechanical_effects.note: Range 10m. Can shatter glass objects.

mechanical_effects.value: Detect whether a place you occupy or object you hold is affected by magic, and identify the type
Illuminates 10m radius from focus item. Lasts one shift. Extinguishes if you reach 0 HP.

mechanical_effects.note: Range 10m, line of sight required

mechanical_effects.value: Reduce power level of all spells targeting the protected person/place by your Protector power level. Also reduces monster magical attack dice by 1 per PL.
Cancel one ongoing spell with power level equal to or lower than your Dispel power level. GM may allow breaking other magical effects.

Reactive — activate after opponent succeeds on spell roll but before effects resolve. Reduce target's power level by your Anti-Magic power level. If reduced to 0 or less, the spell has no effect. Also reduces monster magical attack dice by 1 per PL. Does not replace your action.

mechanical_effects_mode_a.value: Drain up to 4+4_per_pl WP from a humanoid creature (touch). WP spent casting are lost. Cannot exceed your max WP. If target resists, roll with bane.

mechanical_effects_mode_b.value: Transfer up to 4+4_per_pl of your WP to another humanoid creature (touch). WP spent casting are lost. Cannot exceed target's max WP.

mechanical_effects.value: Bind a spell to an inanimate object at Seal's power level. You set the trigger condition. Activating person's WP are used. Without Permanence, seal is consumed on activation. Can combine with Charge or Permanence.

Transfer up to 10_per_pl of your WP into an inanimate object (battery). Anyone touching the object can use its WP. Charged WP dissipate after one shift unless combined with Permanence. Can combine with Seal.

mechanical_effects.note: Permanent. Reduces max WP by 1.

mechanical_effects.value: Cast together with another spell to make it permanent. PL must match target spell's PL. Cannot be used on immediate-duration spells. With Seal, the seal becomes permanent and reusable.

Applied if target succeeds WIL roll (resists sleep but still Dazed)

spells.name: Resurrection
spells.components: Words, gesture, ingredient (the dead person's body)

mechanical_effects.note: Permanent. Caster loses 1 WIL (reduces max WP by 1).

mechanical_effects.value: Revive a dead person (truly alive, not undead). PL 1: within same shift. PL 2: within one day. PL 3: within one week. Beyond one week: impossible. Only one attempt — failure means irrevocable death. Resurrected person loses 1d3 levels in all CHA-based skills (minimum 3).

mechanical_effects.note: GM decides if context is appropriate

mechanical_effects.value: Light or extinguish a candle, torch, or lantern within 10m
Protects against cold (p.54) for one shift. 10m radius.

mechanical_effects.note: Fire damage. Range 20m. Can be dodged/parried as ranged attack. Ignites flammable objects.

mechanical_effects.value: Each additional PL can add 1d6 damage to same target OR create another flame at a different target within range (split damage).

mechanical_effects.note: HP damage to all living creatures in area. Base radius 4m, +4m per additional PL.
WP damage to all living creatures in area.

mechanical_effects.value: All affected creatures become chilled (p.54) — cannot heal HP or WP until warmed. Natural fires in area extinguished. Water freezes to ice.

mechanical_effects.note: Humanoids (not monsters) are frozen solid. Each turn may roll STR (not an action) to break free. Cannot act even reactively while frozen.

mechanical_effects.value: Raise 3m-high, 1m-wide stone pillar from ground. +3m height per additional PL. Anyone on the spot must pass Climb & Jump (not an action) or fall. Under low ceiling, failed roll deals 2d6 crush damage instead. Increased height increases fall damage (p.53).

mechanical_effects.note: Touch. Protection values give no protection.
Crush damage. 10m cone. Pushes targets equal meters. No effect on Large or Enormous monsters.

mechanical_effects.value: Against swarms: deals 2d6+1d6_per_pl damage instead. All human-sized or smaller creatures pushed equal meters to damage dealt.

mechanical_effects.note: Fire damage. Range 30m. Can be dodged/parried as ranged attack. Ignites flammable objects.

mechanical_effects.value: Each additional PL can add 1d8 damage to same target OR create another fire blast at a different target within range (split damage).

mechanical_effects.note: Crush damage. 20m cone from water source. Pushes targets equal meters from source. Requires water source within range.
Reactive. Cast after knowing hit lands but before damage roll. Stacks with armor.

mechanical_effects.value: Raise a wall (1m thick, 2m high, 3m wide) from ground. Each additional PL creates another section. Anyone on the spot must pass Climb & Jump (not an action) or fall. Under low ceiling, failed roll deals 2d6 crush damage.

mechanical_effects.note: Crush damage. 4m sphere, +4m per additional PL. Pushes targets equal meters. Targets land prone.

mechanical_effects.value: With bane on the roll, you can direct-fling a single person to a specific spot within range, choosing whether they take damage and whether they land prone.

mechanical_effects.note: Fire damage. Range 40m. Can be dodged/parried as ranged attack. Ignites flammable objects.

mechanical_effects.value: Each additional PL can add 1d10 damage to same target OR create another firebird at a different target within range (split damage).

mechanical_effects.note: Fire damage. 4m sphere, +4m per additional PL. Hits all targets in area.

mechanical_effects.value: Summon earth elemental. Counts as monster in combat. Follows creator's commands (free action). Acts independently with own initiative. Must stay within line of sight of caster. Duration 15 minutes.

mechanical_effects.note: Crush damage. Auto-hit in melee. Can be dodged or parried.

mechanical_effects.value: Summon fire elemental. Counts as monster in combat. Follows creator's commands (free action). Acts independently with own initiative. Must stay within line of sight of caster. Duration 15 minutes.

mechanical_effects.note: Fire damage. Auto-hit in melee. Can be dodged but not parried. Armor gives no protection.

mechanical_effects.value: See and hear a remote location (must see it or have visited). Range: 1 km at PL 1, 10 km at PL 2, 100 km at PL 3. Concentration duration. Cannot see other dimensions.

mechanical_effects.note: Unarmed attacks only. Duration 15 minutes.
Lift self, person, or object up to human size, float up to 6 m in any direction, then land softly or drop. +2 m per additional PL, or +1 additional target per PL.

mechanical_effects.value: Lifting an unwilling creature imposes bane on the casting roll.

mechanical_effects.note: Touch. Duration 15 minutes. +1 additional target per additional PL.
Touch. Duration 15 minutes. Does not stack with worn armor — only the higher value applies.

mechanical_effects.value: See past events at current location. PL 1: one day back. PL 2: one year back. PL 3: centuries. Visions are fragmentary and cryptic — GM decides content. Concentration duration.
Touch. Dragon roll range on attacks and parries: 1–2 at PL 1, 1–3 at PL 2, 1–4 at PL 3. Weapon counts as magical. Duration 15 minutes.

mechanical_effects.note: Range 10 m. Also pushes target an equal number of meters away.

mechanical_effects.value: Read surface thoughts (range 10 m, concentration). PL 2+ required for deeper memories — recency determines difficulty. Can also send your own thoughts. GM has final say.
Detect direction to nearest specified object, substance, creature type, or phenomenon within range. Range: 100 m at PL 1, 200 m at PL 2, 400 m at PL 3. Immediate.

mechanical_effects.note: Target must perform one movement + one action of caster's choosing (no WP-costing actions). Target loses next turn. Can still speak.

mechanical_effects.value: Opposed WIL roll. GM rolls against target's max WP (reduced by 2 per Focused level), or 10 if WP not listed. PL 1: bane on caster's roll. PL 2: normal. PL 3: boon. No effect on monsters. Range 10 m.

mechanical_effects.note: Touch. Movement value: 6 at PL 1, 12 at PL 2, 24 at PL 3. Ignores obstacles and terrain. Duration 15 minutes. Up to human size.
Must see destination or have visited it. Each additional PL: +1 human-sized passenger OR double range. Cannot cross dimensions.
